Name: Exaella OVA OST
About the game: OST for Exaella OVA movie. 01. Anime Opening 02. Awakening 03. A Mirror of Soul 04. Crossings 05. Dreaming Xonasu 06. Manta 07. Alien 08. Omatase 09. Exercise 10. Playing Shadows 11. Calibration 12. Iron Hearts 13. Mechanical Damage 14. Everything is Different 15. Shokumen 16. In Range 17. Split Seconds 18. I’ve Doomed Them 19. Storage 20. Operator Identified 21. Hayaku 22. Mobilization 23. Silent Whispers 24. Xonasu 25. I've Seen The World 26. Installation 27. No More Directives 28. Anime Ending 29. Slatted Blocks 30. Thru The Pause 31. I'm Here for you 32. Memories 33. The Lotus 34. Promise 35. A Wind of Hope 36. End of Session 37. Power of Hearts 38. No More Tears 39. Ittekimasu Total Running Time: 40:33 Genres: Soundtrack, Classical, Electronic, Industrial, Experimental. Specifications: PCM, 44100 Hz, 16-bit Stereo, 1411 kbps (320 kbps mp3 digital release) Composer: Andrew Oudot. Exaella OVA Opening Song: Melody and Lyrics by Andrew Oudot, feat Akari Yamamoto (あかり山本). Released in 2012.
